languages.text: "Я не могу не напомнить вам, господин ван Калокс, что Патент удостоверяет священное право Вольных Торговцев в случае необходимости вести дела с ксеносами. Если вдруг ваша выдающаяся память вас подвела".

"Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу не напомнить вам, господин ван Калокс, что Патент удостоверяет священное право Вольных Торговцев в случае необходимости вести дела с ксеносами. Если вдруг ваша выдающаяся память вас подвела".

traits.locale_text: "Must I remind you, Mr. van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

"Must I remind you, Mr. van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

"Must I remind you, Mr. van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

"Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

languages.text: “需要我提醒你吗，冯·卡洛克斯大师？根据授状的授权，行商浪人拥有神圣的权利，可以在必要时刻与异形交流。你那非同寻常的记忆力似乎离你而去了。”
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: “需要我提醒你吗，冯·卡洛克斯大师？根据许可证的授权，行商浪人拥有神圣的权利，可以在必要时刻与异形交流。你那非同寻常的记忆力似乎离你而去了。”

languages.text: «¿Debo recordarle, maestro van Calox, que la Patente otorga a los Comerciantes Independientes el derecho sagrado a tratar con xenos de ser necesario? Parece que esa memoria tan excepcional suya le ha fallado».
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: «¿Debo recordarle, maestro van Calox, que la Patente otorga a los Comerciantes Independientes el derecho sagrado a tratar con xenos de ser necesario? Parece que esa memoria tan excepcional suya le ha fallado».

languages.text: 「釘をさすようですが、ヴァン・カロックス様、委任状により自由開拓者には必要とあらば異種族との取引を行う神聖な権利が与えられております。貴方の並外れた記憶力も裏切ることがあるようですな」
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: 「釘をさすようですが、ヴァン・カロックス様、委任状により自由開拓者には必要とあらば異種族との取引を行う神聖な権利が与えられております。貴方の並外れた記憶力も裏切ることがあるようですな」

languages.text: "Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, Meister van Calox, dass der Handelsbrief {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das heilige Recht zubilligt, mit Xenos Geschäfte zu machen, falls erforderlich? Euer außergewöhnliches Gedächtnis scheint Euch im Stich gelassen zu haben."
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: "Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, Meister van Calox, dass der Handelsbrief {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das heilige Recht zubilligt, mit Xenos Geschäfte zu machen, falls erforderlich? Euer außergewöhnliches Gedächtnis scheint Euch im Stich gelassen zu haben."

languages.text: « Maître van Calox, dois-je vous rappeler que la lettre de marque confère aux libres-marchands le droit sacré de traiter avec les xénos en cas de nécessité ? Il semblerait que votre mémoire exceptionnelle vous fasse défaut en cette occasion. »
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: « Maître van Calox, dois-je vous rappeler que la lettre de marque confère aux libres-marchands le droit sacré de traiter avec les xénos en cas de nécessité ? Il semblerait que votre mémoire exceptionnelle vous fasse défaut en cette occasion. »

languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox, Ruhsatname'nin Hür Tacirlere gerektiği zamanlarda zenolarla iş birliği yapabilme hakkı verdiğini sana hatırlamam mı gerekiyor? O olağanüstü hafızan seni yarı yolda bırakıyor galiba."
languages.original_text: "Must I remind you, Master van Calox, that the Warrant endows Rogue Traders with the sacred right to have dealings with xenos when necessary? That exceptional memory of yours seems to have let you down."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat van Calox, Ruhsatname'nin Hür Tacirlere gerektiği zamanlarda zenolarla iş birliği yapabilme hakkı verdiğini sana hatırlamam mı gerekiyor? O olağanüstü hafızan seni yarı yolda bırakıyor galiba."
